org.grouplens.lenskit.transform.normalize

Class DefaultUserVectorNormalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.transform.normalize.DefaultUserVectorNormalizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, UserVectorNormalizer

    @Shareable
public class DefaultUserVectorNormalizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserVectorNormalizer, java.io.Serializable
    Default user vector normalizer that delegates to a generic VectorNormalizer.
    Since:
    0.11
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • normalize

        public MutableSparseVector normalize(long user,
                            @Nonnull
                            SparseVector vector,
                            @Nullable
                            MutableSparseVector target)
        Description copied from interface: UserVectorNormalizer
        Normalize a vector with respect to a user vector.
        Specified by:
        normalize in interface UserVectorNormalizer
        Parameters:
        user - The user to normalize a vector for.
        vector - The user's vector for reference.
        target - The vector to normalize. If null, the user vector is normalized.
        Returns:
        The target vector, if specified. Otherwise, a fresh mutable vector containing a normalized copy of the user vector is returned.

      • makeTransformation

        public VectorTransformation makeTransformation(long user,
                                      SparseVector vector)
        Description copied from interface: UserVectorNormalizer
        Make a vector transformation for a user. The resulting transformation will be applied to user vectors to normalize and denormalize them.
        Specified by:
        makeTransformation in interface UserVectorNormalizer
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID to normalize for.
        vector - The user's vector to use as the reference vector.
        Returns:
        The vector transformaition normalizing for this user.
